# __Teaching experiences__

During my second and third year of PhD I teached various classes for Bachelor students at the University of Rennes 1, Rennes, France 
 
### __1st year of bachelor__ 

- Field excursions in the forest: forest ecology and botany (18 hours) 

- Tutorials: alguea, phylogeny, biology and ecology (6 hours online)

- Practical works: plant anatomy and adaptation (alguea, moss, fern and angiospem) (25 hours)

### __2nd year of bachelor__

- Practical works: angisperm anatomy and reproduction (29 hours partly online)

### __3rd year of bachelor__ 

- Practical works: anatomy of plant adaptation to drought stress (10 hours)
